cat.albirar.communications.core.services

Interface IReportRegister

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReportRegister

    @Validated
public interface IReportRegister
    The report register, that hold any report message. The register hold a collection with Map for each report type (see IPropertiesComm.QUEUE_REPORT_EMAIL and IPropertiesComm.QUEUE_REPORT_SMS). When a new message is reported, a collection should to be indicated. When users ask for get report or check if a report exists, all collection are checked for the indicated id. Warning about this, if AlbirarCommunicationsConfiguration.namingStrategy() is no unique over all collections, a collision can be produced if two reports with same id is put on this register.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Octavi Fornés <ofornes@albirar.cat>

      • removeReport

        Optional<MessageStatusBean> removeReport(@NotBlank

        Remove, if exists, the report associated with the messageId from the collection with collectionId id.

        messageId - The message id
        Returns:
